messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: OT:  Dad having surgery
messages.msgSnippet: Jann, I am so glad that things went well with your father. Still sending prayers for a speedy recovery. --Vanessa ... Vanessa
messages.messageBody:
Jann,

I am so glad that things went well with your father.
Still sending prayers for a speedy recovery.

--Vanessa

messages.subject: Re: OT:  Dad having surgery
messages.msgSnippet: ... father.  Hope all is well with him. Thanks Vanessa!   It went well, they took the kidney and got the tumor, he won t have to have chemo.  I ll go see him
messages.messageBody:
Schafer Vanessa <psychomom95@...> wrote:
> You got it. All good thoughts, and prayers are being sent to your
father. Hope all is well with him.>

Thanks Vanessa! It went well, they took the kidney and got the
tumor, he won't have to have chemo. I'll go see him in the morning!
I'm so relieved!
Jann

messages.subject: OT:  Dad having surgery
messages.msgSnippet: My dad (81) is having surgery today to remove a tumor on one of his kidneys.   I left him at 2PM EST and am waiting to hear from the surgeon.  Please send
messages.messageBody:
My dad (81) is having surgery today to remove a tumor on one of his
kidneys. I left him at 2PM EST and am waiting to hear from the
surgeon. Please send healing vibes/prayers/whatever your favorite
method is in his direction.
Jann
